digest:
- *Efficient Edge LLMs Deployment* explores deploying large models on edge devices using Hessian-Aware Quantization, enhancing performance on limited hardware. More at https://arxiv.org/abs/2508.07329.
- *MASteer* introduces a framework to improve LLM trustworthiness, using adaptive strategies for better model reliability. Details at https://arxiv.org/abs/2508.06963.
- *CognitiveArm* showcases a real-time EEG-controlled prosthetic arm, highlighting advances in AI-driven healthcare solutions. Read more at https://arxiv.org/abs/2508.07731.
- *Multimodal AI Systems* enhance poultry welfare assessments, integrating diverse data streams for scalable monitoring. Learn more at https://arxiv.org/abs/2508.07628.
- *BadPromptFL* warns of backdoor threats in federated learning, emphasizing security risks in AI systems. Explore the study at https://arxiv.org/abs/2508.08040.
- *ComPEFT* achieves significant model compression, optimizing communication in parameter-efficient updates. More information at https://arxiv.org/abs/2311.13171.
